#define ll long long int

#define sld(x) scanf("%lld",&x)

#define N 1123456
#define MOD 1000000007

int main()
{	
	ll t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		ll n;
		cin >> n;
		ll a[n], i, sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin >> a[i];
			sum = sum + a[i];
		}
		ll arr[n];
		if((n+(2*sum)-(n*n))%(2*n)!=0){
			cout << "-1\n";
			continue;
		}
		arr[0]=(n+(2*sum)-(n*n))/(2*n);
		for(i=1;i<n;i++){
			arr[i]=arr[i-1]+1;
		}
		ll ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			ans+=abs(arr[i]-a[i]);
		}
		ans/=2;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
